name: Second Language Pedagogy
description: This course offers a comprehensive survey and analysis of fundamental concepts and issues related to second, bilingual, and foreign language instruction by developing students' knowledge of second language acquisition, approaches to language teaching, computer-assisted teaching, and pedagogical design and implementation in the language classroom.ÿStudents enrolled in this course who submit all written work in the language they are studying (French/Italian) may petition the department for credit towards a Specialist (French or Italian) or Major (French/Italian). [24L]
